description: This file declares functions, macros, and includes guards for the controller component related to post-onboarding handling in an Open Source project, specifically dealing with MAP (Mesh Access Point) control logic, such as policy configuration, channel scanning, and onboarding status checks.

methods.name: map_build_and_send_policy_config
methods.description: Builds and sends a policy configuration message, taking generic arguments and returning an integer status.

methods.name: map_handle_policy_config_sent
methods.description: Handles the callback after a policy configuration message has been sent, processing status and contextual data.

methods.name: map_build_and_send_initial_channel_scan_req
methods.description: Builds and sends a request for initial channel scanning, using provided arguments and message ID.

methods.name: map_handle_initial_channel_scan_request_sent
methods.description: Handles the callback after an initial channel scan request has been sent.

methods.name: map_start_onboarding_status_check_timer
methods.description: Starts a timer to periodically check onboarding status for a given ALE (Access Link Element).

methods.name: map_agent_handle_channel_selection
methods.description: Handles channel selection actions for an ALE and radio, based on specified action.

methods.name: map_agent_cancel_channel_selection
methods.description: Cancels ongoing channel selection for a given ALE.
